chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following issue:
The phone I just received (today) won't charge.

Thank you for your help,

Hello Salima, You will find your prepaid return label attached. Chronopost will handle your return. Choose the location that best suits you to send your package. You can find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/ Return preparation: 1. See instructions for returning an item at here 2. Add all accessories provided with your item 3. Remove any protection, case, and screen protector 4. Package your item and its accessories according to the instructions below. Packaging of the item: • The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item so that it is stable and does not move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label gets damaged. • Take photos of the inside and outside of the package before sending it. This will protect you in case of a problem during transport. Your return is ready to be sent! We'll let you know when it arrives. We're at your disposal, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair or exchange the 29/05/2024. 

The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. 

Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 04/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,

Victoire from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
AS
